entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 17.7°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 15.0°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 31 except 23 near Lake Ontario. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 31 except 23 near Lake Ontario. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 29 except 22 near Lake Ontario. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 29 except 22 near Lake Ontario. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
